metadata.Title: CVE-2016-5027 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
dwarf_form.c in libdwarf 20160115 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via a crafted elf file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-5027` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

dwarfdump - 20160507+git20160523.9086738-1
libdwarf1 - 20160507+git20160523.9086738-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dwarfutils package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '20160507+git20160523.9086738-1').
